data.text:
The Mamas and the Papas is the twelfth episode of the first season of Saved by the Bell.

Summary[]

For a class assignment everyone is put into pairs to act out married life so they are prepared when they grow up: Zack and Kelly, Jesse and Slater, Screech and Lisa. However, Slater sets out to ruin Zack and Kelly's marriage with Screech's aid, because he wanted to be married to Kelly.

Plot[]

Cast[]

Main Cast[]

Mark-Paul Gosselaar as Zack Morris

Mario Lopez as A.C. Slater

Dustin Diamond as Screech Powers

Tiffani Thiessen as Kelly Kapowski

Elizabeth Berkley as Jessie Spano

Lark Voorhies as Lisa Turtle

Dennis Haskins as Richard Belding

Guest Cast[]

Ed Alonzo as Max

Quotes[]

Zack Morris: "Mr. B, what are you doing here?"

Mr. Belding: "I'm here to marry you"

Zack Morris: "Sorry Sir, You're Not My Type"

Mr. Belding: "Zip it, or you'll be honeymooning in Detention"

Zack Morris: "Zipping Sir"

Kelly: "Well I think humor is very important in keeping a marriage together."

A.C. Slater: "Oh yeah..other things are important too."

Kelly Kapowski: "Well I think humor is very important in keeping a marriage together."

A.C. Slater: "Oh yeah..other things are important too."

Jessie Spano: "Really, Slater?"

A.C. Slater: "Sure. Trust, understanding, and great legs."

Zack Morris: "Yeah!"

Jessie Spano: "You macho pig."

A.C. Slater: "Oink, oink, baby!"

Screech: "No way I'm taking off THESE magic underpants."

Zack Morris: "So I can watch The Young and the Restless."

Jessie Spano: "It's more the Blonde and the Useless."

Screech: "Really, Slater?"

A.C. Slater: "Sure. Trust, understanding, and great legs."

Zack Morris: "Yeah!"

Jessie: "You macho pig."

A.C. Slater: "Oink, oink, baby!"

Screech: "No way I'm taking off THESE magic underpants."

Zack Morris: "So I can watch The Young and the Restless."

Jessie: "It's more the Blonde and the Useless."

Trivia[]

When Lisa asked why she had to go with Screech, Mr. Belding said that he put them in alphabetical order. This is a blooper, as Screech's surname name starts with a P and Lisa's last name starts with a T.

Mr. Belding pulls Zack, Slater, and Screech into his office to discuss their punishment for bringing their personal vendetta's into the assignment. Which is incorrect: Slater orchestrated with Screech to break up Zack and Kelly. For once, Zack is the victim as he had no knowledge about this at all, and should not have been punished.
